name: test_e2e_with_logs[062_SQLI_DUMP_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_DUMP_001` |
| **Name** | MySQL INTO DUMPFILE Binary Write |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | file_write |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT 0x3C3F706870 INTO DUMPFILE '/var/www/html/backdoor.php'--`
- **Encoded**: `'%20UNION%20SELECT%200x3C3F706870%20INTO%20DUMPFILE%20'%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fbackdoor.php'--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:54:44.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_DUMP_001-1770818084524-aqqus pattern_id=SQLI_DUMP_001 uri=/?q='%20UNION%20SELECT%200x3C3F706870%20INTO%20DUMPFILE%20'%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fbackdoor.php'-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_DUMP_001-1770818084524-aqqus pattern_id=SQLI_DUMP_001 uri=/?q='%20UNION%20SELECT%200x3C3F706870%20INTO%20DUMPFILE%20'%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fbackdoor.php'-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
